subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Steroids
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Lance Armstrong and Dick Pound, chairman of the World Anti-Doping Agency, are distant, bitter protagonists in a time when stock-car racing, baseball and cycling are all confronting cheating, albeit belatedly.
snippet: Lance Armstrong and Dick Pound, chairman of the World Anti-Doping Agency, are distant, bitter protagonists in a time when stock-car racing, baseball and cycling are all confronting cheating, albeit belatedly.
